# 7-1
mu=1000
n=10

```{r }

# 7-2
mu= 55
z= c(58, 49, 39, 99, 32, 88, 62, 30, 55, 65, 44, 55, 57, 53, 88, 42, 39)
ex=mean(z)
s=sd(z)
t.test(z, mu = 55)
h0 = 55
t.t = (ex - h0) / (s / sqrt(n))
a = 0.05 
c.t = pt(1-a, df=n-1)
p.value = 1-pt(t.t, df=n-1)
t.test(z, mu = 55 )
```
